alert.note: Alert for Androscoggin; Cumberland (Maine) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 28 at 5:55PM EDT until July 28 at 6:30PM EDT by NWS Gray/Portland
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 630 PM EDT FOR SOUTHWESTERN ANDROSCOGGIN AND NORTHWESTERN CUMBERLAND COUNTIES... At 555 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Naples, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Bridgton, Naples, Gray, Raymond, Casco, Sebago and Poland. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. If on or near Long Lake, get away from the water and move indoors or inside a vehicle. remember, lightning can strike out to 15 miles from the parent thunderstorm. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Move to safe shelter now! Do not be caught on the water in a thunderstorm.
